casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Walter Columbus SIMMONS 292P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 29, 2017 Sterling Rozear, Attorney at Law, for Simmons, Walter Columbus. Creecy C. Johnson, Assistant Attorney General, C. Ricky Bowman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of August 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of August 2017."
